charges.charge_description: 18:2113A.F BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE; put in jeopardy the lives of bank employees by the use of a dangerous weapon; (18:2113(d) and 3559(c)).(1)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT: 420 mos. (Ct. 1 -300 &; Ct. 3 - 360 to be served conc.; Ct. 2 - 60 mos. to be served consec); SUPERVISED RELEASE: 5 yrs. (Ct. 1 - 5 yrs.; Ct. 2 -3 yrs.; Ct. 3 - 5 yrs. to run conc.); SPECIAL ASSESS: $300.00; RESTITUTION: $207,3 62.00

charges.charge_description: 18:924A.F PENALTIES FOR FIREARMS; used and carried a firearm during and in the course of an armed bank robbery.(2)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT: 420 mos. (Ct. 1 -300 &; Ct. 3 - 360 to be served conc.; Ct. 2 - 60 mos. to be served consec); SUPERVISED RELEASE: 5 yrs. (Ct. 1 - 5 yrs.; Ct. 2 -3 yrs.; Ct. 3 - 5 yrs. to run conc.); SPECIAL ASSESS: $300.00; RESTITUTION: $207,3 62.00

charges.charge_description: 18:924E.F ARMED CAREER CRIMINAL; having been previously convicted of armed robberies and robbery, knowingly possessed in and affecting commerce a firearm.(3)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT: 420 mos. (Ct. 1 -300 &; Ct. 3 - 360 to be served conc.; Ct. 2 - 60 mos. to be served consec); SUPERVISED RELEASE: 5 yrs. (Ct. 1 - 5 yrs.; Ct. 2 -3 yrs.; Ct. 3 - 5 yrs. to run conc.); SPECIAL ASSESS: $300.00; RESTITUTION: $207,3 62.00
